Package org.skistation.services

Class ClientService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.ClientService
@Service public class ClientService extends Object
Represents a client service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the client table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    ClientService(ClientRepository clientRepository)
    Constructs a new client service with the specified client repository.

      public Optional<Client> getClientById(Integer id)
      Retrieves a client by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the client to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the client if found, or an empty Optional if not

      Updates a client in the database.
      Parameters:
      client - the client to update
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the updated client if found, or an empty Optional if not
